titleStmt.title: The true Catholique formed according to the truth of the Scriptures, and the shape of the ancient fathers, and best sort of the latter Catholiques, which seeme to fauour the Church of Rome : the contents vvhereof are to be seene in the page following.
titleStmt.author: Trigge, Francis, 1547?-1606.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Peter Short, dwelling at the signe of the Starre on Bredstreet hill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the St. John's College (University of Cambrigde). Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Starre on Bredstreet hill
